video:video.video:description: Join us as we talk with two of the developers behind Xbox Dev Kit Mode. Xbox Dev Kit mode enables anyone to start building games on Xbox One. We'll talk about what you need to get started, see a demo&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Episode 17: Girls Make Games
video:video.video:description: Today I chat with Laila the founder of Girls Make Games about how their program is helping to get more girls into game development and interested in STEM. Join us as we talk about Education and how&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Episode 16: GDC 2016 - King's Quest
video:video.video:description: Join us as we chat with Matt Korba from The Odd Gentleman to discuss the new King's Quest game which is fantastic! In King's Quest, King's Graham recounts his greatest adventures to his curious&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Episode 15: GDC 2016 - Unity
video:video.video:description: Considering using Unity? We're just back from GDC where we talked with tons of different indie devs doing amazing things with the Unity Engine. Unity is a very versatile engine so this video helps&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Episode 14: New ways to drive player engagement and retention on Xbox One and Windows 10
video:video.video:description: Join us as we explore the new dashboard update on the Xbox One and look at various ways that you as a developer can help drive increased player engagement and retention with your games on Xbox One and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Episode 13: Interview with Chris Charla from ID@Xbox
video:video.video:description: Join us as we talk with Chris Charla from Microsoft's ID@Xbox program to discuss independent development on Xbox One and Windows 10. [00:57] - Who is Chris Charla[03:25] - What is ID@Xbox and how&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Hour of Code 2015
video:video.video:description: Join millions of kids this week in the largest learning event in history! Microsoft has teamed up with Code.org on the Minecraft Hour of Code tutorial to encourage millions of students around the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Episode 12: Interview with Kalle Hiitola about using Azure for mobile game development
video:video.video:description: Join us as we talk with Kalle Hiitola from Next Games to discuss the recent launch of their new mobile game The Walking Dead: No Man's Land. We'll hear about how the team leveraged Unity and Azure web&#8230;
